/* statisticsUser.selectStatisSndList 전송건수 및 비율 리스트 조회 */ SELECT B.CH , B.CH_NAME , IFNULL(A.TOT_CNT, 0) AS TOT_CNT , IFNULL(A.SUCC_CNT, 0) AS SUCC_CNT , IFNULL(A.FAIL_CNT, 0) AS FAIL_CNT , IFNULL(CONCAT(ROUND(A.SUCC_CNT/A.TOT_CNT * 100), '%'), '0%') AS 'SUCC_RATIO' , IFNULL(CONCAT(ROUND(A.FAIL_CNT/A.TOT_CNT * 100), '%'), '0%') AS 'FAIL_RATIO' FROM ( SELECT CH , CASE WHEN CH = 'FRIENDTALK' THEN '친구톡' WHEN CH = 'ALIMTALK' THEN '알림톡' WHEN CH = 'PUSH' THEN 'Push' ELSE CH END AS CH_NAME , SUM(TOT_CNT) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(FAIL_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT FROM cm.CM_STAT_CH_DAY WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND CORP_ID = #{corpId} GROUP BY CH ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CH , CH_NAME FROM ( SELECT 'ALIMTALK' AS CH , '알림톡' AS CH_NAME UNION SELECT 'FRIENDTALK' AS CH , '친구톡' AS CH_NAME UNION SELECT 'MMS' AS CH , 'MMS' AS CH_NAME UNION SELECT 'RCS' AS CH , 'RCS' AS CH_NAME UNION SELECT 'SMS' AS CH , 'SMS' AS CH_NAME UNION SELECT 'PUSH' AS CH , 'Push' AS CH_NAME ) TMP ) B ON A.CH = B.CH

/* statisticsUser.selectStatisSndCntList 전송건수 조회 */ SELECT CH , YMD , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(FAIL_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT FROM ( SELECT CH , YMD , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(FAIL_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT FROM ( SELECT CH
, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(YMD, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%c.%d') AS YMD
, DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%y.%m') AS YMD
, IFNULL(SUM(SUCC_CNT), 0) AS SUCC_CNT , IFNULL(SUM(FAIL_CNT), 0) AS FAIL_CNT FROM cm.CM_STAT_CH_DAY WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND CORP_ID = #{corpId} GROUP BY CH, YMD ) A GROUP BY YMD, CH
UNION ALL
SELECT C.CH , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(YMD, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%c.%d') AS YMD , 0 AS SUCC_CNT , 0 AS FAIL_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.DATE AS YMD FROM ( SELECT curdate() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a) + (1000 * d.a) ) DAY AS DATE FROM (SELECT 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) AS a CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 as a union all SELECT 1 union all SELECT 2 union all SELECT 3 union all SELECT 4 union all SELECT 5 union all SELECT 6 union all SELECT 7 union all SELECT 8 union all SELECT 9) AS b CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 as a union all SELECT 1 union all SELECT 2 union all SELECT 3 union all SELECT 4 union all SELECT 5 union all SELECT 6 union all SELECT 7 union all SELECT 8 union all SELECT 9) AS c CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 as a union all SELECT 1 union all SELECT 2 union all SELECT 3 union all SELECT 4 union all SELECT 5 union all SELECT 6 union all SELECT 7 union all SELECT 8 union all SELECT 9) AS d ) A WHERE A.DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) B CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 'PUSH' as CH union all SELECT 'RCS' union all SELECT 'ALIMTALK' union all SELECT 'FRIENDTALK' union all SELECT 'SMS' union all SELECT 'MMS' ) C ) D GROUP BY D.YMD, D.CH ORDER BY CH, YMD

/* statisticsUser.selectStatisSndMonthCntList 전송건수 조회 */ SELECT CH , YMD , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(FAIL_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT FROM ( SELECT CH
, DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%c.%d') AS YMD
, DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%y.%m') AS YMD
, IFNULL(SUM(SUCC_CNT), 0) AS SUCC_CNT , IFNULL(SUM(FAIL_CNT), 0) AS FAIL_CNT FROM cm.CM_STAT_CH_DAY WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND DATE_FORMAT(YMD, '%Y%m') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', '')
AND CORP_ID = #{corpId} GROUP BY CH, YMD ) A GROUP BY YMD, CH ORDER BY YMD, CH
